# Wind sound
type=event
location=0,0,1,1

# brazier sound effect
type=event
location=29,34,1,1

[event]
# to Keep Level 3
type=event
location=4,2,1,2
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/14_keep_level_3.txt,17,15
soundfx=soundfx/environment/stairs.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Lionheart's Keep, Level 3

requires_not_status=sq_lionheart_finish
requires_status=sq_lionheart_init
